subject: Extended Deadline (March 15, 2014):: Lebanon conferences
from: "The Society of Digital Information and Wireless Communications (SDIWC)" <donotreply@dcmrf.net>
body:
+-----------------------------------------------------------+
| Please accept our apology for multiple posting. THANK YOU |
+-----------------------------------------------------------+

The Society of Digital Information and Wireless Communications (SDIWC), would like to invite you to attend the following conferences that will be held at the Faculty of Engineering Lebanese University, Campus of Hadath, Beirut- Lebanon, from Apr. 29- May 1, 2014:


** The Third International Conference on e-Technologies and Networks for Development (ICeND2014)

http://sdiwc.net/

===================================================================
** The Third International Conference on Cyber Security, Cyber Warfare, and Digital Forensic (CyberSec2014)

http://sdiwc.net/

===================================================================

Important Dates
==============

Submission Deadline         : Mar. 15, 2014
Notification of Acceptance  : Apr. 15, 2014 
Camera Ready Submission     : Apr. 19, 2014
The last day of Registration: Apr. 19, 2014
Conference Dates            : Apr. 29  May 1, 2014


----------------------------------------

If you want to unsubscribe to this mail message from SDIWC, just follow this link http://dcmrf.net/Filemailer2/sdiwc-mailer/unsubscribe.php?id=65b73db1921a24fbe97786870799ab0b
